alert.note: Alert for Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Helena, north central Livingston and west central Tangipahoa Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montpelier, or near Amite, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Amite, Amite City, Roseland, Montpelier and Easleyville. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 43 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena
